trans-unit.source: Describes the characteristics of a <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref> to the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver egenskapene for en <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"> </xref> til kjøretiden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"></xref> class using the specified name, data type, argument direction, and <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"> </xref> klasse med angitt navn, datatype, argumentet retningen og <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the `type` and `direction` parameters do not match the associated values of `boundArgument`, an <xref:System.InvalidArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `type` og `direction` parametere samsvarer ikke med den tilhørende verdien av `boundArgument`, en <xref:System.InvalidArgumentException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the direction of data flow through an argument.
trans-unit.target: En av de nummereringsverdier som angir sorteringsretningen dataflyt via et argument.

trans-unit.source: The delegate argument that is represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet representanten som representeres av dette <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref> that is represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"> </xref> som representeres av dette <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The bound argument represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"></xref>.
Gets the direction of data flow through the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter retningen på dataflyten via den <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the direction of data flow through an argument.
trans-unit.target: En av de nummereringsverdier som angir sorteringsretningen dataflyt via et argument.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeDelegateArgument"></xref>.
